description: Squared distances that can arise in any Barlow packing of spheres of diameter sqrt(3) (the scale being the simplest one that makes this an integer sequence).
formula: The set of all values of N = xx + xy + yy + 2zz for which x, y, z are integers subject to the proviso that N must be a multiple of 3 if |z| < 2.
author: _J. H. Conway_, _N. J. A. Sloane_.
